title: Cloudflare for AI Helps Businesses Safely Use AI
author: Frederic Lardinois
description: Cloudflare for AI is a new suite of security tools that addresses security concerns in the use of AI models and services.
cntitle: Cloudflare for AI 帮助企业安全地使用 AI
cndescription: Cloudflare for AI 是一套新的安全工具，旨在解决使用 AI 模型和服务中的安全问题。
